adDetails: Are you a small business seeking solutions to support your inventory, financial modeling, or data processing? Have you considered seeking the input of a well versed and experienced individual to provide solutions that will add value to your business? Do you perform tasks or have employees who perform repetitive administrative tasks? Have you considered working with an expert to automate these tasks, saving time and allowing for more productivity? If this is you, then we need to talk. I am a knowledgeable professional skilled at developing and modifying Microsoft Excel, Word, Outlook, & PowerPoint applications that meet the needs of my customers. I charge entirely by the project and will provide an estimate for all projects. I have a lengthy track record of success that I am excited to bring to your organization.
